pli-tv-pvr1.16:5.1: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.16:5.2: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā catasso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.16:5.3: Akkhāyite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.16:5.4: yebhuyyena khāyite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.16:5.5: vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṃ aṅgajātaṃ paveseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.16:5.7: methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā imā catasso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.16:5.8: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.16:5.13: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr1.16:5.16: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā pācittiyāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena.
pli-tv-pvr1.16:5.18: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr1.16:5.21: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca, paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca … pe …. #1
pli-tv-pvr1.16:6.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.16:6.2: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.16:6.4: anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā imaṃ ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.16:6.5: Sā āpatti catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajati?
pli-tv-pvr1.16:6.10: Sā āpatti catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ ekaṃ vipattiṃ bhajati—
pli-tv-pvr1.16:6.15: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr1.16:6.18: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena cāti. #2
